fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guard a player's house during the night.
- Preach to two player during the day. 2 Uses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you guard a player, you will grant them Powerful Defense. If a player attacks your target, you will both deal a Powerful Attack to each other. Basically an Insurgent Bodyguard.
- When you preach to players, you will learn if they are capable of winning together.
